name: Hma
review: This product it to dark and shimmery looks awful. A lot of fallout.

name: shwetadtt8
review: This is a good eye shadow but I am not sure if its a highlighter. The colors didn't highlight at all.. all looked like shades of brown and the white shade is no shimmer just matte white.. I don't think its for me. I am going to return it.

name: Char
review: I use this as eye shadow with another darker eyeshadow. Love this product and keep thinking they might change the color palette or discontinue so I buy several every time in store!!!!

name: KK the runner
review: I grabbed this highlighter because it was cheap, AND because it had a beautiful looking color pallete. The color was virtually non existent. Waste of what little money I spent on it.

name: TEB18
review: Easy to apply - looks like natural light tanning without being over tanned - fake.

name: Thea
review: This is my most used makeup product ever. Admittedly it could blend a little better but for the price it's pretty good. Personally I like that it glitters a little because it makes your skin look glowing and dewy as long as you use it lightly.

name: Makeup Maven
review: I bought it in rose gold and it is gorgeous! Absolutely love this! Also, you can use it as a blush as well!

name: ceebee1990
review: This is the weirdest product. I've heard people rave about it... And I don't understand. I got the "rose" shade. It has awful pigmentation. It is straight up glittery. Terrible. The glitter is too fine to work as a dramatic party look, and not nearly fine enough to work as an everyday highlighter. I have no idea what I'm going to do with this thing. And it's pretty expensive for a drugstore product.

name: Christy
review: I use to highlight my cheekbones.

name: LD
review: I love it & use it daily.

name: Erin
review: Use it as a highlight/blush. It's very lightweight. Just wish it stayed on longer.

name: Norma
review: Worth the price over higher end highlighters does the job very well!

name: Meg
review: I love this stuff! I've been using it for over a month. I have fairly oily and sensitive skin but this stuff has been great. It gives a gorgeous natural glow and really is one of my top 3 summer staples!

name: Dmg
review: No pigmentation and too much glitter. Gave it 2 stars bc I started wearing it as a highlighter and it's ok.

name: Crafty Girl
review: I Love this blush. I have been using it for quite some time.

name: PC
review: I wanted to try a powder highlight and this seemed like a good jumping off point. Meh. The soft pink undertone is nice but there's just too much glitter in this. I wanted something with more of a sheen or glow.

name: Faith dancer
review: I was really disappointed with this product, there was no pigmentation, it hardly showed up and what did show up was just sparkle, which looked totally fake. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

name: Dragonfly Lady
review: It gives my skin a gorgeous glow!

name: PJ
review: Priced well and quality product

name: Brittanyyrb
review:
I really like the color of this Revlon blush, but if you use just a little too much it can make your face look very shiny and glittery.
Having naturally oily skin, I stay clear of anything that gives me more shine, and I'm not really into any kind of make up that looks like it has glitter in it. I will probably pick up a new blush to replace this one as soon as I head back to Ulta.

name: Crafty Girl
review: I use this product everyday.

name: Karen hippie always
review: Just the right color and shine.

name: Ellie
review: Use this product everyday..love it

name: Kate
review: I use this for highlighting and contouring cheeks with a fan brush.  Works great, great colors, stays all day.

name: Teebee
review: Goes with everything!

name: allee
review: This is perfect,  the color, the shimmer, everything is perfect!  Only bronzer I use now, better than hoola bronzer by benefit.

name: jazzy
review: I use this after I put on my foundation.  It adds color to my face without making it look caked on.

name: beachlover
review: Nice color, gives you a bit of a touch of sun on the face

name: Realtor
review: Brightens completion!

name: Caroline
review: I fell in love with this product the first time I tried it. I have it in peach glow and rose glow and love both! I like to mix the colors together and use it as a blush. The only issue I find is that there can be some fall out of the product. Using a lighter hand when applying also helps give a more natural look.

name: Orangefelt
review: I was very pleasantly surprised when I used this product. The colors are very pigmented. Don't be too heavy handed with the bronzer brush or else it'll put too much on. I have used it as bronzer, as a brow bone highlighter, and as eyeshadows too. I think it's a great product! I didn't even wear primer and it lasted 6-7 hours on my face! For the price, I think you are getting a great deal- a product that you can use 3 ways. I used to use Smashbox fusion lights, but I actually prefer this product because it is less shimmery and lasts a lot longer.

name: Purplejewel
review: I bought this product because of the lovely combination of pink colors.  I actually use it as a blush instead of a highlighter and it works well for me I this regard.  I will admit that it is not very pigmented but it works for me because my skin is very pale.  It takes a few swipes to get the amount of color on my check bones that I am looking for but once it is on, it looks lovely with a slight shimmer to it.  I find this color looks very good as a blush in combination with a rainbow highlighter that I recently purchased.  It is a perfect color for summer when you don't want to look quite as "done up".  I think it looks very natural and I plan to use it consistently throughout the summer.

name: Ama
review: I like it , but i have 2 put a lot!! In order 2 look like a normal blush :(

name: BoyMomma
review: I wanted something with pink and orange tones and this was perfect! Not too glittery, just a nice glow for summer.

name: Liz C.
review: I use some of the colors to highlight areas, almost like contouring. I feel that you need to be very fair skinned for the pigmentation to show. Also, if you have redness in your face, it will bring the redness out. As a result, I can only use a few of the color palates and not the entire product. Generally I dap my finger, or the edge of a soft brush to apply. The lightest color is great for highlighting the inside corner of your eyes for a dramatic effect.

name: Plum Moon
review: Just the Right Amount of Shimmer! But I think the Brush Application is Important. I use a Goat brush or other brush that is more rough texture to make sure shimmer gets picked up and deposited onto skin.  I see reviews saying shimmer didn't show up...not sure if this is do to the brush used.  All the "IT Cosmetics" like make-up brushes might be too smooth for this....too fluffy.  Otherwise the application will probably fall flat and translucent like.  I found this wears all day and love to see the shimmer over my blush.

name: Leanne
review: The only problem I had with this highlighter was that it just wouldn't pick up on my brush! To fix the problem I just simply used my pointer finger to apply the highlighter and it worked just fine. Pigmentation and shine were spot on for me.

name: Andi
review: I returned this because it had absolutely 0 pigmentation. It was like nothing. Just dust. Nothing stuck to the skin.

name: Abigail S.
review: Not sure if I didn't use this product properly or what but it just doesn't show up on my skin and I have fair skin, not much of a shimmer to it so I don't consider it a highlighter. Disappointed...

name: LJ
review: I like that it's a mix between blush and bronzer and gives a natural look that I like. I've been using this product for over a year and haven't been able to find another blush/bronzer mix that is as good as this one.

name: Y
review: It seems to be very light when added to the cheeks

name: Shonacat
review: Starting to experiment with highlighting and contouring, this is a great basic highlighter that's easy to apply and doesn't require a lot of know how, just a big fluffy brush. Made my skin look as if I had a nice touch of color from the sun, even though it's winter. Touch ups are required as it only lasts a few hours.

name: Cat Bru
review: I use this product everyday. I love it. The only con, it doesn't last all day

name: Southern Belle
review: On my second one.  Love the end result of these colors mixed together.  Not harsh at all.

name: bethas20
review: Pigment is terrible

name: Chrissy
review: Is great blends well

name: MCLW
review: This product was purchased for my daughter, however I did try it and I felt it went on evenly, added a natural brightening to the skin as well as good color.

name: Tina
review: It is ok not much as a highlighter at least for me it works as a very light Baluch topper

name: LB
review: I've tried so many different drugstore highlighters (nyx, maybelline, physicians formula) and really disliked the chunky glitter in all of them, so I had low expectations when I picked this up on clearance. I bought the shade peach glow and it's actually a beautiful, natural, non-obnoxious highlighter when swirled together. Definitely recommend.

name: Kim
review: I wouldn't recommend this product. I thought it was eyeshadow.

name: Freedomrider
review: Great for every day and for use in all Seasons.
